ROOT:
SELECT * FROM ADMINISTRATOR.EMPLOYEE
WHERE
EMPNO IN(SELECT EMPNO FROM ADMINISTRATOR.EMPLOYEE
WHERE
WORKDEPT IN(SELECT DEPTNO FROM ADMINISTRATOR.DEPARTMENT
WHERE MGRNO IS NOT NULLMGRNO IS NULL AND ADMRDEPT IN(@ADMRDEPT1) )
AND WORKDEPT IS NOT NULLAND WORKDEPT IS NULL AND SEX IN(@SEX1) )
AND EMPNO IN(SELECT EMPNO FROM ADMINISTRATOR.EMPLOYEE
WHERE
WORKDEPT IN(SELECT DEPTNO FROM ADMINISTRATOR.DEPARTMENT
WHERE MGRNO IS NOT NULLMGRNO IS NULL AND ADMRDEPT IN(@ADMRDEPT2) )
AND WORKDEPT IS NOT NULLAND WORKDEPT IS NULL AND SEX IN(@SEX2) )
AND WORKDEPT IS NOT NULLAND WORKDEPT IS NULL AND SEX IN(@SEX)
ORDER BY
SUB1, ｘｘｘ, null
SUB2, Boolean, true
SUB3, ｘｘｘ, null

ISNOTNULL1, Boolean, true
ISNOTNULL2, Boolean, true
ISNOTNULL3, Boolean, true
ISNOTNULL4, Boolean, true

ADMRDEPT2, String, A00, D01, E01
SEX1, Char, M, F
